#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#define llu unsigned long long int
int main()
{
    int t,n,f;
    llu s,e,x,y;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> s >> e;   
        cin >> n;
        f=0;
        while(n--)
        {
            cin >> x >> y;
            if((x>s && x <e)||(y>s && y <e)) f=1;
        }
        if(f)
        cout << "NO\n";
        else
        cout << "YES\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
